trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around August 10th 2009
divs: sighting detailswe were driving on the highway at night the city of austin texas to our right. when i look over and see a glwoing light about the size of a quater. suddenly it turned into 3 or four balls of light that were slowly weaving in and out of each other. they would turn into 1 ball and then 3 or four balls for several minutes and then it became a sigular ball again for several more minutes and then it was just gone. we were freaking out!!!! it was unexplainable and i wonder what the hell we saw. people say we were on drugs but no drugs were involved this [cms\tg\pd] was jsut crazy!!!
Summary: Several balls of light hovering in sky over Austin, Texas.
